    Package Description
    com.ibm.di.api.security
    Provides classes for managing the security mechanism.
    com.ibm.di.connector
    Provides classes for the Directory Integrator's connectors.
    com.ibm.di.security
    Provides classes for the Security Verify Directory Integrator security and encryption.
    com.ibm.di.util
    Provides utility classes for the Security Verify Directory Integrator.
